content.text: The decoder is composed of a stack of N = 6 identical layers.
How many identical layers does doecoder has?
It was trained on the standard WMT 2014 English-German dataset consisting of about 4.5 million sentence pairs.
What does the training data constists of?
The model was trained on one machine with 8 NVIDIA P100 GPUs.
What was the hardware used to train the model?
